sentence.Network_en: As Wren's epitaph famously declares, the cathedral itself is his monument.
sentence.Network_cn: 众所周知，雷恩的墓志铭中写道，大教堂本身就是他的纪念碑。

sentence.Network_en: Authors are famously ignorant about the realities of publishing.
sentence.Network_cn: 作者们不了解出版界的实际情况，这是人所共知的。

sentence.Network_en: I got on famously with Leary from the first time we met.
sentence.Network_cn: 我和利里第一次见面就相处甚欢。

is so popular that an Indian army major famously shouted in the snowy Himalayan valleys after a key victory against the Pakistanis in the 1998 Kargil war .是如此的流行，这是印度陆军少校大喊一句名言在喜马拉雅雪山峡谷的一个关键的胜利后，对巴基斯坦在1998年卡吉尔战争。

list.abs: Deng ' s reforms famously allowed some people to get rich first ., 邓小平提出的改革极大地使一部分人率先富裕起来.
as Alan Greenspan famously said , the ongoing global downturn is a " once-in-a-century type of event . "正如阿兰·格林斯潘所言，这场进行中的全球衰退是一次“世纪事件”。
this is our most famouse dish ., 这是我们最出名的菜肴.
The famously liberal Dutch are towards the right ., 著名的自由荷兰人将争取权利.

entry.tran: (通常指由于突出或极端而)著名地，出名地
entry.def: You use famously to refer to a fact that is well known, usually because it is remarkable or extreme.

example.ex: Authors are famously ignorant about the realities of publishing...
example.tran: 作者们不了解出版界的实际情况，这是人所共知的。

example.ex: As Wren's epitaph famously declares, the cathedral itself is his monument.
example.tran: 众所周知，雷恩的墓志铭中写道，大教堂本身就是他的纪念碑。

entry.def: If you get on or get along famously with someone, you are very friendly with each other and enjoy meeting and being together.

example.ex: I got on famously with Leary from the first time we met.
example.tran: 我和利里第一次见面就相处甚欢。

means.word_mean: 1. in a manner or to an extent that is well known;

auth_sentence.content: Paul Revere once famously barked The British are coming!
auth_sentence.res_content: Paul Revere once famously barked The British are coming!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Paul Revere once famously barked The British are coming!

auth_sentence.content: Most famously, he dreamed up the geodesic dome.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most famously, he dreamed up the geodesic dome.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most famously, he dreamed up the geodesic dome.

auth_sentence.content: Famously wore a cardigan during a televised fireside chat.
auth_sentence.res_content: Famously wore a cardigan during a televised fireside chat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Famously wore a cardigan during a televised fireside chat.

Sentence.sentence: He also famously remarked that all of man's problems come from his inability to sit quietly in a room alone.

sentences.en: War is famously ‘the continuation of policy by other means’.
sentences.cn: 战争是“以其他方法延续政策”，这种说法很出名。

means.word_mean: 关系很好； 相处融洽

sentences.en: My mother and my mother-in-law are getting on famously.
sentences.cn: 我母亲和我婆婆相处得很好。
